name: Zongi
description:
Your world has been invaded by a zombie plague. You are on your own, because you are on a deserted island. To start, you were given an axe, a pickaxe and a gun. A game packed with adrenaline and excitement. Your goal is to survive and eliminate 10 waves of zombies.  I hope this game will make you verry excited and fun.

The aim is pretty easy. You need to protect yourself before zombies. When you spawn, you have some tools in your equipment. For now you can't update them, so don't even try ;). After 10 seconds first wave of zobies will attack you. In this time you can collect materials for defences building, to be more safe. You can cut down trees witn your axe, and crush stones with pickaxe. You can also kill zombies with the gun. Game has 10 waves builder in.  If you survive all waves, you win. At 10, final wave you will mit a boss zombie. Try to challenge yourself, and play! When you win, you can comment this game on itch.io with your success, and congratulate yourself 

Wish you nice game ;)
